  • Method Details

    • move

      public Occ move​(int count)
      Move index to the next position and return a pointer on the new current Object, clear the last left Object to not find it at extreme right. Because the line is circular, there no limit, move to a position bigger than width will clear data.
      Returns:
      the new current chain

    • __next

      public Occ __next()

      Returns:
      the new current chain
